altTitles.vi: Phòng ngủ của con gái tôi

description.en: He had sex with his own daughter-though, of course, only in a dream. Goto, a university lecturer, had seemingly built a happy family: a beautiful wife who is a painter and lovely, talented children... But that happiness was merely a facade. During the day, he suspected his wife of infidelity, and at night, he was tormented by nightmares, gradually wearing down his mental stability. One day, Goto returned home to find his room in chaos and his daughter in tears. Convinced that his wife was to blame, Goto vows to protect his beloved family...!?
description.ja: 実の娘とセックスをした――もちろん夢の中で。大学講師の後藤は幸福な家庭を築いていた。美しい画家の妻、可愛く優秀な子供たち‥‥しかし、その幸福はハリボテだった。昼には妻の不貞を疑い、夜は悪夢に悩まされる日々の中で後藤の精神は擦り切れていく。そんなある日、帰宅した後藤が見たのは荒らされた自室で涙を流す娘の姿。妻の犯行と確信した後藤は大切な家族を自分が守ると決意するが‥‥!?
description.vi: Goto, một giảng viên đại học đang tận hưởng cuộc sống gia đình đầm ấm bên vợ mình là một nữ họa sĩ ăn khách xinh đẹp cùng hai người con. Nhưng rồi khi bắt đầu nảy sinh mối hiềm nghi vợ mình ngoại tình, cộng thêm bản thân đang bị một cơn ác mộng giày vò đã khiến tâm trí anh trở nên ngày càng suy sụp thấy rõ. Bỗng một ngày nọ khi vừa đi làm về, Goto phát hiện phòng ngủ của con gái mình bị ai đó phá tan hoang, và con gái anh đang ngồi khóc trên sàn. Tin rằng những hành động điên rồ này là chỉ có thể là do vợ làm ra, Goto liền quyết định sẽ đứng lên bảo vệ gia đình nhỏ của mình.

title.en: My Wish Is Two Separate Beds

description.en: Julia, the Queen of Semele, has a dilemma—her childhood friend and husband, Endymion. Married through an arranged union, they’ve shared a bed for 12 years, growing up like siblings. But one day, everything changes. “Do we really need to share a bed? You should break this habit, especially for your future concubine who’ll bear your child…” “My child? With who?” Suddenly, their dynamic shifts. Endymion leans closer, locking eyes with Julia. “My child… will be with you.” His whisper sends shivers down her spine. Since that night, sharing a bed has become unbearably awkward. “Can we please just use separate beds?”

With everyone's memories having been altered, Boruto finds himself being hunted by his own village. After escaping with Sasuke, what future awaits Boruto...?

(Source: MangaPlus)

---

**Links:**
- [Viz - Alternative Official English](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/boruto-two-blue-vortex)
description.es:
La memoria colectiva de la gente ha cambiado, y ahora la Villa de la Hoja va detrás de la vida de Boruto. Pese a las adversidades, alguien ha estado esperando junto a Sasuke después de abandonar la Villa.

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.fr: Les « souvenirs » des gens ont changé et désormais, la vie de Boruto est menacée au village caché de Konoha. La situation est telle que Boruto quitte le village avec Sasuke sans savoir ce qui les attend…
description.id:
Sesuatu telah mengubah "memori" para warga. Boruto yang kini menjadi buron melarikan diri dari Konoha bersama Sasuke. Di tengah konflik itu, yang telah menanti keduanya adalah...

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.th:
"ความทรงจำ" ของผู้คนเปลี่ยนไป ทำให้โบรุโตะต้องตกอยู่ในฐานะที่โดนหมู่บ้านโคโนะฮะงาคุเระหมายชีวิต ท่ามกลางเคราะห์ร้ายที่ประสบ สิ่งที่รอคอยโบรุโตะซึ่งหนีออกจากหมู่บ้านไปพร้อมๆ กับซาสึเกะก็คือ...

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.vi:
Với ký ức của mọi người đã bị thay đổi, Boruto thấy mình đang bị chính ngôi làng của mình săn đuổi. Sau khi trốn thoát cùng Sasuke, tương lai nào đang chờ đợi Boruto...? 
Đây là phần 2 của Boruto
description.pt-br: As "memórias" das pessoas foram alteradas e Boruto está numa posição onde a Vila Oculta da Folha quer tomar a sua vida. Durante essa adversidade, o que Boruto aguardava quando deixou a vila com o Sasuke era...

description.en:
The mask causes disaster. The mask prefers slaughter. The mask has a will. A traveling mask merchant Pell who can create a mysterious mask that grants abilities. In a city with a gloomy atmosphere, I meet a mysterious girl, Sona…!? The boy begins to walk at the end of publicity and self-discipline! Masked battle fantasy!
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/the-vermilion-mask)
The manga centers on Yano, a virgin boy who dreams of success as an erotic manga artist. One day, he encounters a totally naked palm-sized girl.
description.ja: エロ漫画家として成功を夢みる専門学生・矢野。彼の前に突然、手のひらサイズの美少女が現れる。漫画賞を目指したいのに、俺の弁当に何かいるんです！

title.en: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell

altTitles.fa: مشاوره‌های عشقی از اربابِ بزرگِ دوزخ

altTitles.uk: Любовні поради від величного герцоґа Пекла

altTitles.pl: Miłosne Porady od Wielkiego Księcia Piekieł

description.en: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
description.fa: دختر رویاهات روحشم خبر نداره که تو وجود داری. هیچ کمکی هم از دست دوستات بر نمیاد. خونواده‌ت هم از این قضیه خبر ندارن. خب حالا برای مشاوره گرفتن به کی رو می‌زنی؟ کی می‌تونه تورو که یه عاشق دل‌خسته‌ای، اساسی کمک کنه تا برای همه‌چیز آماده باشی؟ اگه یه نوجوون معمولی مثل پال باشی، یه شیطان گولاخ از اعماق دخمه‌های جهنم احضار می‌کنی و جدی جدی امیدواری که همه‌چی درست پیش بره!
description.fr: Un étrange étudiant invoque un puissant démon. Que peut-il bien vouloir ?
description.it:
La ragazza dei tuoi sogni a stento sa che esisti, gli amici non ti possono aiutare, la famiglia non ne sa nulla. Ma allora, dove cercare consigli d'amore? Chi può provvedere a darti quell'assistenza essenziale per il tuo cuore? Se sei il ragazzo della porta accanto, Paul, allora ti basta evocare un potente demone dai più profondi abissi dell'Inferno e, francamente, sperare per il meglio.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/unfins)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/unfins)

description.en:
The ten kings of the underworld judge the souls of the dead based on their deeds in life, but due to an incident, the leader of the ten kings, King Enma, accidentally let the souls of 108 violent criminals escape! King Shinkou comes to the human world to recapture the escaped souls, and runs into a young man named Onomura being chased by one...?

A non-stop hell comedy by Tanaka Mai, author and artist of "A Terrified Teacher at Ghoul School!"

title.en: Class no Inkya Ojousama no Shitsuji ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: クラスの陰キャお嬢様の執事になりました

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Inkya Ojou-sama no Shitsuji ni Narimashita

altTitles.en: I Became the Butler of the Gloomy Young Lady in My Class

altTitles.es-la: Me Convertì en el Mayordomo de la Señorita Amargada de mi Clase

description.en:
My family abandoned me in the night leaving me behind, so I became the butler of the gloomy young lady in my class...

---
Support the author by buying the manga in [Booth.pm](https://booth.pm/ja/items/4380401).
description.ja:
家族が夜逃げし行き場をなくした主人公を拾ったのはクラスの陰キャお嬢様！
執事として尽くすうちに少しずつ絆が芽生え、一人ぼっちですさんでいたお嬢様の外見や態度にも変化が…？

altTitles.ja: 魔法戦記リリカルなのはForce

description.en: Six years after the JS Incident, a young dimensional traveler Touma Avenir rescues a mysterious mute girl named Lily Strosek from a secret research facility on a distant world of Ruwella. When rescuing her, she gives Tohma an amulet that gives him access to a new Device power. However, unbeknownst to them, there is another with a similar Device causing massive damage and injury. Tohma becomes an unwitting accomplice in an incident involving the Book of the Silver Cross, an ancient Belkan magical tome, leading to an investigation by the Time Space Administration Bureau and the latest interdimensional crisis faced by the former Riot Force 6 members…

title.en: The Life of the Witch Who Remains Single for About 300 Years!

description.en: Once, Kurokawa Mikage was the fearful “Witch of Moonlight,” but now, 300 years later, she’s just an office lady and teased by her co-workers for still being single. Mikage thinks she’s fine with her ultimate spinster life, posting fake photos of a pretend relationship… Until the young and handsome Kobayashi Satoru joins her company! Is this the start of a real, bewitching romance at last!?

A little-known classic, brought to you by the mangaka of Dokaben and Abu-san and the creator of Apache Baseball Team, Zenikko is a gritty look at money and capitalism, and one kid’s attempts to game the system in his favour.

altTitles.it: Cronache dalla Fondazione di un Impero in un Altro Mondo

altTitles.pt-br: Crônicas da Fundação de um Império em Outro Mundo

description.en:
A protagonist reborn in another world.  Apparently he had been reincarnated as an abandoned child.  Before his eyes were abandoned children like him.  In order to survive, he led them into farming.  Little by little, orphans gathered, and upon hearing rumors of a village, others began to migrate.

The group that had been nothing but children had become a village before anyone realized. Then various countries in the surroundings started to have an eye on it. This is the epic tale of the man who would later be known as the Divine Emperor.
description.fr:
Un protagoniste renaît dans un autre monde, se réincarnant en tant qu'enfant abandonné. Autour de lui, d'autres enfants abandonnés sont dans la même situation. Pour survivre, il les guide dans l'agriculture. Peu à peu, des orphelins se rassemblent et, attirés par les rumeurs d'un village, d'autres commencent à arriver.

Le groupe d'enfants finit par former un véritable village sans que personne ne s'en aperçoive. Bientôt, plusieurs pays voisins commencent à sy 'intéresser. Voici l'épopée de l'homme qui sera plus tard connu sous le nom de l'Empereur Divin.
description.it:
Il protagonista rinasce in un altro mondo.
A quanto pare, sembra che si sia reincarnato in un bambino orfano.
Poco dopo, si trova davanti altri bambini abbandonati come lui.
Per poter sopravvivere, si mette alla loro guida ed iniziano a coltivare.
Poco per volta, iniziano così a creare un villaggio. Arrivano altri orfani. Ma anche come la voce di questa comunità si diffonde, persone di tutti i tipi.
Questo gruppo, partito come nient'altro che un gruppo di bambini, diventa quindi un villaggio prima di rendersene conto.
Ed è così, che i diversi Paesi circostanti iniziano ad interessarsi a loro.
Questa è l'epica storia dell'uomo che in seguito sarebbe stato conosciuto come il Divo Imperatore.
description.pt-br:
Um protagonista renascido em outro mundo.  Aparentemente ele reencarnou como uma criança abandonada.  Diante de seus olhos estavam crianças abandonadas como ele.  Para sobreviver, ele os conduziu à agricultura.  Aos poucos, os órfãos foram se reunindo e, ao ouvirem rumores de uma aldeia, outros começaram a migrar.

 O grupo que não passava de crianças tornou-se uma aldeia antes que alguém percebesse.  Então vários países do entorno começaram a ficar de olho nisso.  Esta é a história épica do homem que mais tarde seria conhecido como o Divino Imperador

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái tôi là cô giáo

description.en: Can sensei be the heroine? Please?    Due to a traumatic experience, I have a distrust of people called "sensei". I, Saigi Makoto, was called by after school by the most popular and beautiful teacher at my school, Fujiki Maka-sensei. "I... love you" Eh– a confession out of the blue!? "Until you say you love me, I will continue to pursue you." Ever since then, I've been called by for "guidance counselling" after school, somehow watched AV together, being given excessive skin-ship, went on dates together. Over time, I gradually became conscious of Sensei...? But isn't it bad for Sensei to go out with her student? Lesson start!
description.ja: 過去のトラウマが原因で“先生”と呼ばれる人が嫌いな彩木慎は、校内一の美人教師・藤城真香に呼び出される。二人きりの生徒指導室、神妙な面持ちの先生が発したのは「わたしは、君が好きです」まさかの告白で…!?
description.pt-br: Devido a uma experiência traumática, eu nunca mais confiei em pessoas com o título de “professor”. Certo dia eu, Saigi Makoto, fui chamado depois da aula pela professora mais bela de toda a escola, Fujiki Maka-sensei, para de repente ela se confessar do nada e falar que continuará me perseguindo até eu disser que sim!

description.en: After falling into the sea and going missing, Woo Young-jang returns to civilization after spending 7 years on a deserted island! His body has become firm and muscular, he can now communicate with all sorts of animals and even employ their special abilities. However, incidents and accidents seem to follow him wherever he goes. Will Young-jang be able to survive in the city, which is said to be even more terrifying than the jungle?
description.ko:
바다에 빠져 실종된 후, 무인도에서 7년 만에 살아 돌아온 우영장의 좌충우돌 문명 적응기!
그의 몸은 단단한 근육질로 변했고 온갖 동물과의 의사소통은 물론, 특별한 능력까지 구사하며 사건사고가 끊이질 않는다.
과연 영장은 밀림보다 무섭다는 도시에서 살아남을 수 있을까?

title.en: Wan Gu Shen WangImmortal God King

description.en: The past life died because of the imperial concubine, and he was born again in the high school era. It coincides with the recovery of the aura and the great changes in the world. When rejuvenating a teenager, he will follow the path of his journey, and he will protect his own friends. Loved ones. When he does not choose to stay, he will push him all the way.

altTitles.ja: マギクラフト・マイスター

description.en:
There is only one Magi Craft Meister in the world. After the death of the last Meister over one thousand years ago, Jin Nidou was transported to another world in order to succeed her will.

After obtaining the knowledge of the Magi Craft Meister, Jin attempts to use a warp gate but it malfunctions, transporting him to an unknown world. Along with that, an automata he recently restored also uses the warp gate in order to search for her “father”. Thus, the crafting journey of the new Magi Craft Meister begins!
description.ja: 異世界に召喚された二堂仁は、世界でただひとりの魔法工学師（マギクラフト・マイスター）の後継者に指名された。先代の知識、研究所にある素材すべてを受け継いだ仁は地球の知識も使い、異世界でモノ作りで人を幸せにしようと奮闘する。

description.en:
When discussing conquest, Il Palazzo's motto would most likely be "start small." ACROSS, a group devoted to carrying out and accomplishing the ideals of absent-minded yet bishounen Il Palazzo, feels that the first step in conquering the entire planet would be conquering a single city. This city just so happens to be Fukuoka, where our story takes place.
___
**Official English (Digital):** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/excel-saga)

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon: Elma OL Nikki

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid: Elma's Office Lady Diary

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン エルマのＯＬ日記

altTitles.zh-hk: 小林家的龍女僕 艾瑪的OL日記

altTitles.zh: 小林家的龙女仆 艾玛的OL日记

altTitles.it: La cameriera drago di Kobayashi: il diario da office lady di Elma

altTitles.vi: Nhật ký gái công sở của Elma

altTitles.uk: Драконопокоївка пані Кобаяші: Офісні дні Ельми

altTitles.vi: Hầu Gái Rồng Nhà Kobayashi: Nhật Ký Công Sở Của Elma

description.en: A spin-off of [Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon](https://mangadex.org/manga/15514) focusing on the daily life of Elma.
description.id: Sebuah spinoff dari [Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon](https://mangadex.org/manga/15514) yang berfokus pada keseharian Elma.
description.ru: Спин-офф основной серии, фокусирующийся на повседневной жизни одной из драконов, Эльмы.

title.en: March Comes in Like a Lion

altTitles.th: ตราบวันฟ้าใส

altTitles.pt-br: Sangatsu no Lion – O Leão de Março

altTitles.de: Der März kommt wie ein Löwe

description.en:
A youth named Kiriyama Rei, who lost his family as a child, endures loneliness to become a professional shogi player. Then, through a chance meeting, he develops a relationship with the three Kawamoto sisters (Akari, Hinata, Momo), who hail from a working-class district of the city, and little by little his frozen heart begins to thaw.  
 
--- 
- **Won the 4th Manga Taisho Award in 2011**  
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2011, which it shared with Space Brothers**
-  **Won the 18th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2014**
description.pt-br: Kiriyama Rei tem 17 anos e é um jogador profissional de shogi, mas na vida real, ele não tem nada. Calmo e não muito social, Rei não tem família, sem amigos, e ele não vai à escola. Ele é apenas familiarizado com uma mulher chamada Akari, que é sua vizinha que mora sozinha com suas duas irmãs mais novas, Momo e Hinata. Este é um mangá seinen dia-a-dia, com monólogos fortes e as reflexões Rei.

altTitles.ja: 炎の闘球女 ドッジ弾子

description.en: A modern version of the legendary manga "Flaming Ball boy Dodge Danpei" a hot blooded dodgeball manga! Danko, who inherited Danpei's soul struggles to create the strongest super dodgeball team in the Reiwa era! Will Danko be able to overcome the common sense of the modern world!? Look forward to all the beautiful girls passionately drawn by Koshita Tatsuhiro.

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

title.en: Iinchou Desu ga Furyou ni Naru Hodo Koi Shitemasu!

altTitles.ja: 委員長ですが不良になるほど恋してます！

altTitles.en: I'm the Class President, but I Fell in Love and Became a Bad Girl!
I'm the Class President, but I Fell in Love and Became a Delinquent!

description.en:
Ryoko Masaki is a serious class president, yet she has decided to become a delinquent to catch the attention of her childhood friend, Masato Todoroki. The reason is that as a discipline committee president, Masato always goes out of his way to remind delinquents about their attire, yet he doesn't pay any mind to the serious Ryoko. That's why Ryoko decided to dye her hair and shorten her skirt, and when Masato saw her, he was devastated and concerned. Is this what Ryoko had hoped for...?

A ridiculous rom-com between a serious class president and a dense discipline committee member!
description.ja: クラス委員長を務める真面目な真崎涼子 (まざき りょうこ) は、 ある決意をする。それは、不良になって幼なじみの轟正斗 (とどろき まさと) の気を引くこと。なぜなら、 正斗は風紀委員長で、不良に対しては注意するが、真面目な涼子には構ってくれないから。髪を染め、スカートも短くした涼子を見て、正斗は動揺し、何があったのかと気にかけてくれ、涼子の思惑通りとなったのだが…!?
description.pt-br:
Ryoko Masaki é uma presidente de classe séria, no entanto, decidiu se tornar uma delinquente para chamar a atenção de seu amigo de infância, Masato Todoroki. A razão é que, como presidente do comitê disciplinar, Masato sempre faz questão de lembrar os delinquentes sobre suas vestimentas, mas ele não dá atenção a Ryoko, que é séria. Por isso, Ryoko decidiu tingir o cabelo e encurtar a saia, e quando Masato a viu, ficou arrasado e preocupado. Será que isso era o que Ryoko esperava…?

Uma comédia romântica ridícula entre uma presidente de classe séria e um membro desatento do comitê disciplinar!

altTitles.ja: 幻覚少女がつきまとう話

altTitles.en: A Story About A Hallucinatory Girl Following Me Around

altTitles.vi: Cô gái trong ảo giác của tôi

altTitles.ja: 幻覚少女がつきまとう ハミタの読み切り

altTitles.ja-ro: Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou - Hamita no Yomikiri

altTitles.en: A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around - Hamita Oneshots

altTitles.cs: Příběh o halucinózní holce co se za mnou slídí

description.en:
A story about being followed around by a girl who appears to be just a hallucination.

---

Note: The original web comic that was released on on Twitter and Pixiv has been compiled on Amazon into 1 ebook volume titled Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou (幻覚少女がつきまとう) "A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around" and released on March 25, 2024.

* Alternate Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/116706658)

title.ja: Clevatess -Majuu no Ou to Akago to Shikabane no Yuusha-

altTitles.ja: クレバテス－魔獣の王と赤子と屍の勇者－
Clevatess -The King of Devil Beast, The baby, and The Brave of Undead-

altTitles.en: Clevatess -The Devil Beast King, The Baby, & The Corpse Hero-
Clevatess - The King of Devil Beasts, the Baby, and the Brave of the Undead

altTitles.pt-br: Clevatess - O Rei das Feras Diabólicas, O bebê e a Valente Heróina Morta-Viva

description.en:
He killed the heroes, killed the king, the devil beast then found the “baby of fate”…

Having both superior intellect and destructive power, such is Clevatess, the devil beast king.
Angered by the 13 heroes' attempt to take his life, he had decided to bring ruin upon humanity, but he gets entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby.

Is this the tale of a world close to apocalypse or a diary of new-era childcare?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000841)
description.pt-br: Ele matou os heróis, matou o rei, a fera demoníaca então encontrou o “bebê do destino”… Tendo intelecto superior e poder destrutivo, tal é Clevatess, o rei das feras demoníacas. Irritado com os 13 heróis encarregados de tirar sua vida, ele decidiu arruinar a humanidade, mas foi encarregado de um incômodo inesperado: um bebê humano recém-nascido. É a história de um mundo próximo do fim, perto do apocalipse, ou o diário dos cuidados infantis da nova era?

description.en: Lu Nanzhi reincarnated into a stand-in romance novel as vicious female rival, and her task is to make the heroine Chen Xi achive happiness. The industry beauty thought that attacking the heroine was also a way to ‘make the heroine happy’, so she took the initiative to pursue the heroine. But she gradually felt that the attitude towards herself from the surrounding characters seemed to be different from that in the book?

altTitles.fr: Le Nectar de la Malédiction Divine

altTitles.th: ศึกน้ำทิพย์แห่งมนตรา

description.en: Sakura, the last surviving princess of a fallen kingdom, is being hunted down for the power of Ambrosia she possesses - the ability to grant divine strength, but only to a human. With no human companion, she decides to summon one from another world in a desperate attempt to find a knight to protect her, but the man who answers her call is less than what she had hoped for.
description.ja: アダール侯国の生き残りであるサクラ姫が異世界より召喚したのは平凡な青年カイ・ワタリ! だが彼は呪乳(ネクタール)を吸うことで恐るべき戦士へと変身する……!!
description.pt-br: Sakura, a última princesa de um reino caído está sendo caçada devido ao poder de ambrosia que possui- habilidade a qual concede força divina, mas apenas aos humanos. Sem nenhum companheiro humano enquanto fugia, ela se viu obrigada a invocar desesperadamente um cavaleiro de outro mundo para se proteger, mas o homem que ela acaba invocando aparenta ser muito menos do que ela gostaria do que fosse. Conseguirá Sakura se proteger?

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

Ooshima Nagi is an 28 year old office lady always trying to read the mood and fit in. Berated by her boss, taken advantage of by her colleagues, and betrayed by her boyfriend, Nagi quits her job and severs contact with everyone in her social circle in order to restart her life from scratch. Will Nagi be able to change herself, or will she fall back into her old ways?  
  
**Note**: Nominated for the 11th Manga Taishou Awards (2018).  
Nominated for the 12th Manga Taishou Awards (2019).  
Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Awards (2020).
A story about how a pre-6th Gen Head Kawachi Tesshou first encounters and then joins the Front of Armament, and also meets characters like Murata Shougo.

altTitles.ja: 妻が口をきいてくれません

description.en:
***Winner of the 25th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize for "Short Story!***

A highly discussed and polarizing work that delves into marital issues, sparking major media reactions!

*Why is my wife angry...?*

A husband who thought he was living a peaceful life with his wife, daughter, and son as a typical four-person family suddenly finds himself in an unspoken crisis. One day, his wife stops talking to him. Days turn into weeks, and eventually, this wordless existence stretches into six years. There's no memory of a major fight, and household chores and childcare continue as usual. The only difference? Beyond the bare minimum of necessary communication, his wife doesn't speak to him at all.

Originally serialized to great acclaim on the *Yomitai* website, this much-anticipated book includes the shocking final chapter written exclusively for this release.

altTitles.en: The Sleepless Night of the Maid

altTitles.es-la: La noche de insomnio de la doncella

description.en:
After the ruin of an aristocratic family in England, Eva Macy has been living a difficult life as a maid at an acquaintance’s house, where she happens to meet her ex-fiancé Prince Edward.

Despite being a strong and cold-hearted person, he is affectionate towards her. After he leaves, Eva realizes that he’s her first love. However, she decides to give up on her current feelings, believing it to be in her best interest to do so.

After overcoming such a difficult time, Eva's feelings for Edward calmed down, but one day, Edward suddenly appeared before her as if to stir up Eva’s heart again.

Eva becomes a chambermaid for her ex-fiancé Edward, where he constantly tries to seduce Eva.

The relationship she thought had ended a long time ago continues again in his chambers...

title.en: I Tried Asking My Cool Girlfriend for a Favor

altTitles.ja-ro: Cool Kanojo ni Onegai Shite Mita

altTitles.ja: クール彼女にお願いしてみた

altTitles.en: I Tried asking a favor to my Cool Girlfriend

altTitles.ro: Am Încercat Să-i Cer o Favoare Iubitei Mele Cool

altTitles.vi: Tôi nhờ cô bạn gái nghiêm túc làm nó vì mình

description.en: The beautiful English teacher Momoko Irosaki receives what she thinks are the lustful gazes of her male students every day... or so she misunderstands!? What goes on in the school life of a teacher who inadvertently indulges in fantasies full of allure...?
description.ja: 美人英語教師の色咲先生は、日々男子生徒から思春期真っ盛りの視線を浴びている…のは勘違い!? ついお色気全開の妄想をしてしまう先生の学校生活は――…。ちょっとえっちでかなり笑える妄想スクールコメディ!!
description.ru: Красивая учительница английского Иросаки Момоко, как ей кажется, каждый день ловит на себе похотливые взгляды своих учеников мужского пола... Или она просто неправильно их понимает?! Что происходит в школьной жизни учителя, который невольно предается таким фантазиям?...
description.vi: Irosaki-sensei, một giáo viên trẻ xinh đẹp, hoạt bát,... Nói chung là mặt tiền cô rất  tuyệt với, học sinh đứa nào đứa nấy cũng mê. Nhưng thật ra "mặt trong" của cô lại không được xán lạn đến vậy. Và rồi cô gặp một cậu học trò yêu thích môn tiếng anh mà cô đang giảng dạy, thay vì nghĩ rằng "ồ, siêng quá ta", thì trong đầu cô lại chỉ có vô vàn suy nghĩ đồi trụy rồi tự gán hết lên người cậu học sinh ấy, nói chung là ngây ngô lắm cả nhà XD.

description.en: A sweet and happy two year marriage felt like a dream. One day, her husband disappeared without a trace. Han Seoryeong, an ordinary housewife and blind woman, desperately searches for him... “You’ll never find him.” Her husband turned out to be the best secret agent with many faces. “Our marriage was everything to me, but it was just ‘work’ to him?” In the midst of her world crumbling, Seoryeong mistakenly unleashes the madness she had been suppressing.…
description.fr:
Deux années de mariage aussi douces qu’un rêve.
Mais un jour, son mari disparaît sans laisser de trace.

Han Seoryeong, femme au foyer ordinaire et non-voyante, part à sa recherche,
mais la vérité qu’elle découvre dépasse l’imaginable.

Son mari était un agent secret aux cent visages,
et tout ce qu’elle croyait vrai n’était qu’une façade pour son “travail”.

Dévastée par le désespoir, Seoryeong laisse exploser la folie qu’elle avait refoulée.
Si elle ne peut pas le traquer, elle choisira de devenir sa proie !

title.en: Daigaku Nyuugakuji Kara Uwasa Sareteita Bishoujo San Shimai, Ikiwakareteita Gimai Datta.

altTitles.ja: 大学入学時から噂されていた美少女三姉妹、生き別れていた義妹だった。

altTitles.ja-ro: Daigaku Nyuugaku Ji kara Uwasa Sareteita Bishoujo San Shimai, Ikiwakareteita Gimai Datta

altTitles.en: The Three Beautiful Sisters Rumored Since College Entrance Were Actually My Long-Lost Stepsisters.

description.en: The three sisters, once clingy and needy as children, have now grown into beautiful young women—and for some reason, they've developed a strong possessive streak! This youth romance-comedy kicks off as they reunite, and the beautiful trio start competing for attention!
description.ja:
子供の頃は甘えん坊だった三人は美人になり、なぜか独占欲が強くなっていた！
再会をキッカケに美少女三姉妹に迫られる青春ラブコメ開幕！

title.en: Isekai Majutsushi wa Mahou o Tonaenai

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Majutsu-shi wa Mahou wo Tonaenai

altTitles.ru: Волшебник из другого мира не произносит заклинаний

altTitles.ja: 異世界魔術師は魔法を唱えない

altTitles.zh: 異世界魔術師不詠唱魔法

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Majutsushi wa Mahou wo Tonaenai

altTitles.en: The Other World's Wizard Does Not Chant

description.en:
The Magician named Yard was suddenly summoned in different world as a Hero. The sorcery in this world is behind compared to Yard who came from another world. The other summoned heroes are also unreliable. Furthermore, it is not possible to return to the former world… In such a hopeless situation, Yard chuckles to himself. Get ready, humans of this world. This world where witchcraft is behind. I have enormous toy in this box. allow me to play with it. The Villainous magician named Yard tramples down the other world with overwhelming Dark magic!  
  
[Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n5389bx/) (Raw)
description.pt-br:
O mago chamado Yard foi repentinamente convocado em um mundo diferente como um 「Herói. A feitiçaria neste mundo está atrás em comparação com Yard, que veio de outro mundo.Os outros heróis convocados também não são confiáveis. Além disso, não é possível voltar ao mundo anterior. Em tal situação desesperadora, Yard ri de si mesmo.

「Preparem-se, humanos deste mundo. Este mundo onde a bruxaria está para trás.Eu tenho um brinquedo enorme nesta caixa. deixe-me brincar com isso 」

O mago Vilão chamado Yard atropela o outro mundo com magia negra avassaladora!

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

title.en: Good Night, See You In My Dreams

description.en: A long corridor bathed in red… A ghostly figure lurking in the shadows… Dozens of hands, their long, spindly fingers grasping at your throat… Sounds like the stuff of nightmares, right? But it’s not the kind of thing that troubles Seongha. She’s just your average high-school kid with a head full of exam stress. Her classmate Isu, on the other hand, has been plagued by that very dream for years. And it’s taken its toll, leaving her exhausted and alone. So one day, when Seongha finds herself inside Isu’s dream, both girls know that something seriously freaky is going down. Can Seongha save Isu from her nightmares?

title.en: Magical Explorer - Reborn as a Side Character in a Fantasy Dating Sim

altTitles.ja: マジカル★エクスプローラー エロゲの友人キャラに転生したけど、ゲーム知識使って自由に生きる

altTitles.en: Magical★Explorer - Reborn as a Eroge Hero's Friend, I'll Live Freely with my Eroge Knowledge

altTitles.ru: Переродившись в друга главного героя эроге, я буду жить свободно, используя мои знания эроге

altTitles.en: Magical★Explorer - I was reincarnated as a friend character in an eroge, but I use my knowledge of the game to live freely.
Magical★Explorer It seems I have become a Friend of the Protagonist in an Eroge World, but because Magic is fun I have abandoned the role and train myself.

altTitles.ja-ro: Magical★Explorer - Eroge no Yuujin Kyara ni Tensei Shitakedo, Game Chishiki Tsukatte Jiyuu ni Ikiru

description.en: There’s a legendary Bishoujo Game that has become popular among Japanese gentlemen. Its name is “ Magical★Explorer” or Magiero for short. The game’s protagonist has a cheat-like power with 12 different beautiful heroines to flirt with, including additional 12 heroines from the DLC, a harem of 24 beauties. I have become that protagonist!………………Not. Instead, I have become the third-wheel character who always laughing like an idiot next to him. There’s no heroine that would lay their eyes on me.    But now I couldn’t care less about the protagonist and his heroines. Why? Because I discovered magic. While I was using it, I have become interested in it. I want to master it. I want to become the strongest. Thus I have decided. I would abandon half my role as a protagonist’s friend to train my magic and then I would beat the hell out of that cheat who can solo the Demon King.    ………..I was training with that thought in mind, but somehow I keep getting closer to the heroines and furthermore, I don’t know why I keep encounter events like I am some Eroge’s protagonist.
description.ja: 伝説の美少女ゲーム『マジカル★エクスプローラー』。俺はこのゲームでチートなスキルを持つモテモテの主人公！……の横でへらへらと笑う不遇な友人キャラに転生していた…！？

title.en: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu~

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu~

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island with Four Beautiful Girls

description.en: More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！
___
- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

Haro Ogawa, a high school student, is also a self-taught oil painter who is trying to paint the ultimate nude. 
After an unexpected encounter with an elusive "witch", he sets his sights on applying to art school... 
The mystery that resides in the human body, the ultimate "beauty", will be painted on canvas! 
A skin-colored coming-of-age drama!
description.ja: 「俺もいつかこんなヌードを描きたい――」　幼少時に見た絵画、「魔女のヌード」に魅入られた高校生・小川波路（おがわはろ）。日々、独学でヌードを描く彼の前に現れたのは、「魔女のヌード」に描かれた女性に瓜二つの美女、神生伶だった。ハロは思わず、伶にヌードモデルになってほしいと頼みこむが…!?　目指すはヌードで藝大合格!!

altTitles.fr: Le chevalier qui ne vit qu'aujourd'hui

description.en: Is dying repeatedly a blessing? Enkrid's life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach, until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day! Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat, just how far can he go?
description.pt-br: "Você é um gênio." Essas palavras que ele ouviu quando era criança eram veneno. Encrid sonhava em ser um cavaleiro, mas logo percebeu que era fútil. "Quer viver pela espada com esse nível de habilidade?" Uns davam risada dele. "Apenas desista." Outros aconselhavam contra. Mesmo assim, o sonho dele não morreu. Ele dormia menos, corria mais, e se esforçava pra caramba. Um dia, morreu, com uma espada perfurando sua garganta. Encrid abriu os olhos novamente para a "manhã de hoje".

description.en: Shavonne is a writer who lives in a run-down apartment in the streets of the slums. One day, strange memos start showing up at his front door. Before he can uncover the mystery behind them, he encounters a beautiful young man that keeps peeling onions on the staircase next to his unit. After accepting a dinner invitation from the young man, Shavonne discovers a dead body in his host’s bedroom…

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランド オーダー－モルターリス：ステラ－

description.en: The official adaptation of the TYPE-MOON phenomenon that has become one of the most popular mobile games in the world! The year is 2016, and glitches found in humanity’s past threaten the sustainability of its future. The Chaldea Security Organization - tasked with preserving human history for as long and as strongly as possible - has developed a new method of time travel to repair these events, stabilizing humanity’s future. But when an unknown threat pushes mankind to the brink of extinction, young recruits Mash Kyrielight and Ritsuka Fujimaru find themselves at the helm of the rescue mission: Obtain the Holy Grail in a face off against fate itself …
description.id:
Tahun 2016, dan gangguan yang ditemukan di masa lalu umat manusia mengancam keberlanjutan masa depannya. Organisasi Keamanan Chaldea–yang bertugas melestarikan sejarah manusia selama dan sekuat mungkin–telah mengembangkan metode baru perjalanan waktu untuk memperbaiki peristiwa ini, menstabilkan masa depan umat manusia. Tetapi ketika ancaman yang tidak diketahui mendorong umat manusia ke ambang kepunahan, rekrutan muda Mash Kyrielight dan Ritsuka Fujimaru menemukan diri mereka di pucuk pimpinan misi penyelamatan. Dapatkan Cawan Suci dalam menghadapi takdir itu sendiri… Adaptasi resmi dari TYPE-MOON fenomena yang telah menjadi salah satu game mobile paling populer di dunia!

Holy Grail War seorang gadis dan pemuda dimulai! Mash Kyrielight yang berafiliasi dengan Organisasi Pelindung Umat Manusia, Chaldea, bergabung dalam misi melindungi sejarah umat manusia. Di hari yang sama, dia bertemu dengan seorang pemuda bernama Ritsuka Fujimaru yang tertidur di ruang istirahat..?

Didistribusi di Indonesia oleh [Gramedia](https://www.gramedia.com/products/fategrand-order-mortalis-stella-01)
description.ru: Альтернативная манга-адаптация основных сюжетных актов игры Fate/Grand Order. Покрывает акты Фуюки, Орлеан, Септем, Лондон, Камелот. Повествование ведется от лица Маш.

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.
